name: Jovian Gasbags
description:
Jovian Gasbags is an Asteroids clone, created for the One Game A Month challenge, in about a week. It features increasingly difficult levels, local highscore saving, and a soundtrack by Kevin Macleod (doesn't everyone have one of those...).

Controls: Arrow keys / WASD to move, Spacebar/Control to shoot. Press escape to pause the game, and press R once you've died to restart (or press the restart button). M to mute the music.

Music by

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
